A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: They've really lost the plot with all this. I wish they would make up their minds and either make a movie about new characters in the SW universe or just tell the preexisting characters' stories. The creators are caught in the middle and we are left with ill-defined characters being used to tell the stories of other characters by proxy. And as a result\, even the established returning players seem like they are losing their characterization..
